item.description: I missed him the last time he was in Boston this Summer. I got word that he is coming back for the end of November! Description from Johnny D's Facebook Event Page: The amazing desert musician from West Africa is back! Omara “Bombino” Mactar is known as one of the great guitar players and performers in the Shahel and Shara regions and has developed a cult like following. His music is widely featured in the acclaimed and multi-award winning documentary, Agadez, the Music and the Rebellion. This film traces the centuries old trade routes and musics linking North and West Africa. A night not to be missed. Of Bombino's music critics say; “…This is a record can be placed in the category marked,’ spellbinding’.” – Montreal Mirror “I can’t imagine any album being better than this in 2011.” – The Huffington Post http://www.bambinoafr...
item.name: Bombino at Johnny D's
